div.p: This value set expansion contains 3 concepts.

td.a: First meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered-84

tr.td: First meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered

div.p: Count of vaccines administered (where "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines") = 1

td.a: Second meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed-99

tr.td: Second meningococcal dose from the primary series was administered. The primary series has been completed

div.p: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines")

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD18SMeningococcalQuadrivalentConjugateVaccines2Doses for IMMZ.D18.S.Meningococcal.Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines 2-dose schedule. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a meningococcal vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccine (A,C,W135,Y-D), 2-dose schedule
